lead_paragraph: Clint Malarchuk, who had his jugular vein slashed by a skate in a game in 1989 while playing for the Buffalo Sabres, is recovering after accidentally shooting himself in the chin.
snippet: Clint Malarchuk, who had his jugular vein slashed by a skate in a game in 1989 while playing for the Buffalo Sabres, is recovering after accidentally shooting himself in the chin.
